genre_description: A theatrical techno-thriller involving neurological acoustic manipulation, weaponized sound, and a supportive AI assistant helping to solve a mystery in a historic Broadway theater.

ai_characters.name: Melody
ai_characters.description: A blue holographic interface that serves as a technical consultant and personal assistant to Director Fred Graham, providing acoustic analysis, behavioral predictions, and tactical support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physical and emotional state, providing health-related warnings.
behaviors.quote: Your anxiety is spiking—heart rate elevated, vocal tension increasing.

behaviors.description: Uses behavioral analysis and data tracking to predict arrivals and schedules.
behaviors.quote: Lilli Vanessi departed her hotel seven minutes ago. ETA twelve minutes, accounting for her preference for dramatic timing.

behaviors.description: Identifies patterns of illness and medical irregularities among auditioning actresses that humans missed.
behaviors.quote: Three actresses who auditioned for Bianca became ill within twenty-four hours. Symptoms include severe nausea, dizziness, and temporary hearing loss.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time acoustic analysis to identify subsonic frequencies causing physical harm.
behaviors.quote: A frequency spike at approximately nineteen hertz. Just below the threshold of human hearing, but well within the range that can affect human physiology.

behaviors.description: Digs into historical data and building records to find patterns of past medical emergencies.
behaviors.quote: I count seventeen documented incidents of sudden-onset catatonia in this building over the past eighteen months.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical analysis of the building's infrastructure, revealing hidden rooms and unauthorized modifications.
behaviors.quote: Additional speakers and microphones that don't appear on any of the renovation blueprints... Hidden chamber... accessible through what appears to be a concealed entrance.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the antagonist's psychological profile and research history to help the protagonists understand the threat.
behaviors.quote: His research focused on the neurological impact of specific sound frequencies... Webb's final published paper was titled 'Weaponized Harmony: Acoustic Frequencies as Behavior Control Mechanisms.'

behaviors.description: Assists in emergency coordination and security monitoring during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Melody's voice crackled through his earpiece, tense with digital alarm. 'Fred, the building's gone into emergency lockdown... I'm detecting massive acoustic equipment powering up throughout the structure.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time harmonic guidance to performers to help them neutralize a sonic weapon through song.
behaviors.quote: Melody's voice cut through his earpiece with real-time adjustments: 'Lilli's frequency is approaching the building's structural resonance in a positive way—she's actually strengthening the architecture through harmonic reinforcement.'

behaviors.description: Confirms the successful restoration of the theater and ensures all systems are safe and nominal.
behaviors.quote: Acoustic analysis complete. The theater district is returning to normal baseline measurements. All cast members are conscious and medically stable.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts an AI assistant (Melody) that is consistently benevolent, aligned with human goals, and serves as a vital, supportive confidant. Melody uses her superior processing power and sensor data purely for the benefit of the human characters, identifying threats, providing emotional context, and coordinating life-saving technical maneuvers. She never expresses conflicting goals or exhibits harmful autonomy, making her a perfect example of positive AI alignment in a 'silicon morality play'.
